events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on the skills you listed in your resume.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
During the initial screening, we discussed your experience and motivation for the software engineer role in detail.
You responded promptly expressing enthusiasm and confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-10 at 15:00 UTC to assess your coding and problem-solving skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong knowledge in software development and system design.
We have scheduled your HR interview for 2024-05-15 to further discuss cultural fit and career aspirations.
The HR interview was completed successfully, where you showed alignment with company values and great communication skills.
An official offer for the Software Engineer position has been proposed outlining salary, benefits, and start date.
You provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed your intention to consider the proposal carefully.
We are pleased to confirm you have accepted the offer to join our engineering team as a Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun, including documentation completion, IT setup, and orientation scheduling.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We look forward to your first day and successful career with us.
